title: Doxology
lyrics:
DOXOLOGY
Praise God from whom all blessings flow;
Praise him, all creatures here below;
Praise him above, Angelic host:
Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.
We thank the Lord for spiritual food
And most because of Jesus Love
Let manner to our soul be given
The Bread of Life sent down from Heaven
For Christ sake, Amen
“Official Says”
May the saving Grace of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ
The Love of God and the fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all
“Everyone Says”
Amen
“Official Says”
May the Blessing of God the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit
Rest and abide with us now and forever more
“Everyone Says”
Amen
